author: Javier C Hernandez, Vivian Wang, Javier C Hernandez, Vivian Wang
title: Coronavirus: China's youth begin to resist Communist Party agenda in wake of Covid-19 outbreak
description: Angry and agitated, many young Chinese are pushing back on government efforts to conceal its missteps
content: Students have flooded social media to organise donations for Chinese doctors battling the coronavirus epidemic. Workers have marched in the streets to demand compensation for weeks of unemployment during citywide lockdowns. Young citizen journalists have take… [+9801 chars]
